trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_000<tab>Assuming I was a shepherd, seeing items used for tending sheep may help me remember something crucial. At least, I hope it will...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_001<tab>It still gets chilly at nighttime, but these mountains were once frigid. What do you think I used to stave off the cold?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_002<tab>Hello, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I do hate to keep troubling you, but might I see some items that a person might eat?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_003<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I feel likely to regain the rest of my memories at any moment. Just a little further, and I'm sure to recall my true form.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_004<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Always so good to see you, my friend.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Make a delivery (<var 20 E803 /var> remaining).
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Cast glamour on Anden.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Learn about custom deliveries.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>What would you learn more about?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>Satisfaction level.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Delivery requirements and rewards.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>Procuring collectables.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>Acquiring materials.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>Increasing the value of crafted collectables.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>Increasing the value of gathered collectables.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>Increasing the value of fish.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_001_000<tab>With each successful delivery, Anden will come to trust you more and more, leading him to task you with assignments of greater importance.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_001_001<tab>This will be displayed in the form of a gauge atop the Custom Deliveries list. Fill this gauge to the maximum, and Anden's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─as represented by little golden hearts─will increase.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Upon reaching a new <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you will have the opportunity to learn more about Anden and his former self.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_007_000<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 80 or above.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_007_001<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Should you find yourself unsure as to how to procure a particular item, subcommands and item descriptions can point you in the right direction.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_001<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Likewise, for Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_003<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_102_003<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_004<tab>The items sought by Anden fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Anden deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Anden seeks may be purchased from Aenc Ose in Lydha Lran.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_000<tab>The collectability of crafted items is directly related to their quality. Spare no effort in ensuring that the items you craft are of the highest possible quality, and you will be rewarded accordingly.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_002<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inner Quiet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, granted each time you successfully increase quality, will serve you particularly well.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_003<tab>Accumulate as many stacks of the status as you can, then put the final flourish on your masterpiece with <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Byregot's Blessing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_004<tab>There are a host of other actions that can serve to further enhance the quality of items you craft. Once you've mastered the fundamentals, you are encouraged to experiment with varied approaches until you find your preferred crafting approach.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Before gathering a collectable item, you must increase its collectability.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_001<tab>One technique miners and botanists may employ to raise collectability is the use of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scrutiny<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scour<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Try executing this combination a few times before gathering the item.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_002<tab>Gatherers seeking to procure items with higher collectability must be certain to equip gear with higher <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> ratings, as these attributes influence the effectiveness of actions that raise collectability.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Of course, these actions cannot be used to their full potential without sufficient <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>GP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. A healthy balance of all three attributes is essential to make the most of your gathering.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_000<tab>The collectability value of fish follows a simple rule─the bigger, the better.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Upon arriving at the fishing hole or teeming waters where your desired quarry resides, use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action, then begin fishing or spearfishing.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_002<tab>When fishing, using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by effective hooking actions will increase your chances of reeling in a big one.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Should you still find yourself catching only small fry, try outfitting yourself with better equipment to raise your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_000<tab>The items sought by Anden fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Anden deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_008<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 80 or above.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_009<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>Information on how to find individual items may be found in the following manner:

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_002<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the relevant recipes.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_003<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Anden seeks may be purchased from Aenc Ose in Lydha Lran.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_004<tab>For Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log and recipes in question.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_005<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>The higher an item's collectability, the greater the reward you will earn from Anden upon successful delivery.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>To learn more about collectables and how to increase collectability, speak with Anden and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Learn about custom deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Anden's trust.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>With each successful delivery, Anden will grow more and more satisfied with your efforts. Fill the gauge completely and Anden's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, giving you the opportunity to learn more about him.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>You can make up to six deliveries in a given week. Deliver the items Anden needs, and deliver them often to win the trust and praise of your new leafy acquaintance!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>You have reached the weekly limit for deliveries. You may begin again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_000<tab>Tending sheep requires food, medicine, trimming shears, cleaning supplies... Oooh, what's that you have there?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_001<tab>Mountainous climes are nothing to sneeze at. Rather, they <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> be without warm clothing or blankets or some such thing.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_002<tab>Voeburtite cuisine may prominently feature lamb and mutton, but rest assured that sheep cuisine prominently features leafman fronds. What goes around comes around, I suppose...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_003<tab>Voeburt once boasted a high population of artisans who crafted armor and weapons and all sorts of little things. I have no doubt a master craftsperson stands somewhere in these flowering fields─a leafman forever dreaming of creation!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_004<tab>I've been giving Eo Tyr milk and sweets like I used to, but if you've anything handmade that you think they might enjoy, I'd be most obliged.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_000<tab>Being chewed on by sheep is not an entirely pleasant sensation, believe you me...but providing for them brings me great satisfaction. However, leaves alone do not a diet make─sheep need hay and a salt lick, at the very least.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_001<tab>It's natural for people to weather harsh climes by burning fuel for warmth. But once you understand what it means to be potential kindling, you never see fire the same way again!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_002<tab>Considering the purity of the streams and quality of the soil, this area may be perfect for cultivating vegetables. It's little wonder why all the leafmen here are so verdant and lush.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_003<tab>Between mineral resources from the mountains and yields from my flock, supplies for crafting seem more than plentiful here. Do you think the climate might even accommodate for cotton? In the warmer seasons, of course...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_004<tab>I asked Eo Tyr what other sorts of things they like, and they said “shiny stones and fragrant flowers.” Rather reminds me of what Tellina used to collect when she was young...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_000<tab>These sheep look so content as they graze, but grass alone won't bring out the luster of their wool. A good supplement to their diet might, though... Seaweed, perhaps?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_001<tab>Warm soup sounds like a delightful way to stave off the cold─and I daresay freshwater fish would produce some excellent stock.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_002<tab>The sea seems rather far away, but delicious freshwater creatures are surely plentiful in these rivers and lakes. If the surface freezes? Why, simply cut a hole through the ice!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_003<tab>If your handicraft serves a practical purpose, it may very well need repairs at some point. A clever artisan chooses materials readily available to them, and few sources are more reliable than all these lakes and rivers...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_004<tab>Pixies seem to have a particular weakness for pretty colors─or, at least, Eo Tyr does. If you happen to find any alluring shells or whatnot, I'd be most grateful to take them off your hands.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_JUDGEMENT_ANDEN_000_000<tab>Oooh! How lovely. You have my gratitude, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_JUDGEMENT_ANDEN_000_001<tab>Your generosity is humbling, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Truly, I thank you!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_JUDGEMENT_ANDEN_000_002<tab>F-For me!? I cannot fully express how grateful I feel, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Oooh, thank you, thank you, and thank you again!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>To collect your reward, make room in your inventory and speak with Anden once more.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_000_000<tab>You have brought me so many nice things─it's a shame I can't put any of them to use. I daresay I'm far closer to sheep nourish<var 1A 02 /var>ment<var 1A 01 /var> than nourish<var 1A 02 /var>er<var 1A 01 /var> in my current state.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_000_001<tab>But that regret in and of itself feels like a clue─and these items do seem profoundly familiar, somehow. Hmm...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_001_000<tab>Come to think of it, if the climate here had stayed as cold as it was, I would have wilted and died straightaway, correct? A chilling thought.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_001_001<tab>I suppose this floral paradise is my unexpected savior─as are you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thanks to you, I think I've remembered something more of my past...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_002_000<tab>Water and sunlight provide all the sustenance a plant could ever need, but after looking at these foodstuffs, I can't help but feel a strong affinity for eating. Oooh, yes, I do miss a good chew...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_002_001<tab>...No, this is no time for swallowing! Er, wallowing. Just a little more, Anden─remember what once you ate!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_003_000<tab>I must say, recently it feels easier than ever to recall details from my former life. I'm all aflutter, and I don't just mean the breeze through my branches.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_003_001<tab>I have little doubt that it's all thanks to you and these incredibly familiar supplies you've been bringing me. The desire to put my hands on them is overwhelming...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_001<tab>Oooh! That's it! I-I've remembered something.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_002<tab>You were right, Eo Tyr─I <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> a shepherd. And I lived here with my sheep and cared for them very, very much.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_003<tab>Yes! That's right, Anden. Go on, go on.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_004<tab>Originally, we lived up on the mountainside, across the lake. But when the Flood came, we were forced to evacuate down here. Oooh, my little flock didn't like the move one bit. They never got along with the local shepherds...though I'm sure they do now that their wardens are tasty leafmen!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_005<tab>And there was one other they didn't take to, as I remember.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_006<tab>Back before the Flood, a Galdjent traveler once assisted me with some work. Perhaps it was due to his hulking stature, but my sheep couldn't see him but to batter him with their tiny hooves. Heh! I shouldn't laugh, but the sight was really quite charming...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_007<tab>Wh-What's this? Have I returned to my true form!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_008<tab>But I've hardly remembered anything! No, this doesn't feel right─I can say with relative certainty that I was never this gigantic.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_009<tab>Tee hee hee! Ahahaha! So anxious, Anden. No need to fret!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_010<tab>This is only a glamour─just a teeny-tiny taste of who you might-have-may-have-sort-have been. Or not! Either way, I've kept that fluffy, leafy head of yours for luck. How precious you look!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_011<tab>I thought you'd feel more comfortable with the appearance of a mortal. And the more limbs you have, the more I can make them flail!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_012<tab>I-I suppose this does make communication easier in a fashion... But what's this about making me flail!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_013<tab>Ahahaha! That's right, just like that. Oh, you are ever so droll!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_014<tab>Oooh, why must you delight in my discomfort? Thanks to you, I'm bound to be battered to mulch by my adorable charges!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_015<tab>Which─ Well, I suppose there are worse ways to go...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_001<tab>I think I remember splitting firewood! And resenting that I had to do so, as I much preferred tending to the sheep.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_002<tab>Yes, yes! You never <var 1A 02 /var>could<var 1A 01 /var> tear yourself away from your sweet fluffies, Anden. You'd forget all about your chopping and then have to do it in the middle of the driving snow. You'd be out there shivering and sniffling and muttering such dark words!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_003<tab>Y-You saw all of that? Oooh...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_004<tab>W-Well, firewood aside, I do remember enjoying a comfortable life here!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_005<tab>You see, wool was always in high demand, here in...Voeburt, was it? Yes, Voeburt! That's what this place was called.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_006<tab>I would have my wool spun to yarn in the castle town, and as knitting was a rather popular pastime, people were happy to pay good coin for it. One can never have too many pairs of fuzzy socks, after all.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_007<tab>Speaking of, I remember gifting a pair of woolen gloves to a traveler once. Someone who helped me with an errand... An elf! Yes, I once knew an elf who was rather averse to the cold...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_008<tab>Oooh? I've changed again. Eo Tyr!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_009<tab>Tee hee! Ahahahahahaha!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_010<tab>Elven Anden! You look just like that Urianger fellow who used to live at the Bookman's Shelves. ...Well, I suppose he wasn't <var 1A 02 /var>quite<var 1A 01 /var> so leafy.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_011<tab>He's one of your friends, isn't he, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_012<tab>Oooh, Urianger was ever so fun to play with. He was too polite to say anything ill, so we would gift him treats he <var 1A 02 /var>loathed<var 1A 01 /var> and laugh at his sad face while he ate them. What fun we had! But you're just as entertaining, Anden─don't you fret.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_013<tab>I-Is that supposed to be a good thing? I don't know whether to feel flattered or horrified...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_001<tab>I've got it! I remember my favorite dish.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_002<tab>There was a tavern in the castle town that served an exquisite lamb stew. Normally, I would prepare my own meals, but that dish in particular I preferred to pay for.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_003<tab>The first time I saw you eat sheep, Anden, I thought I had been thrown into the queerest of dreams. Oooh, to think the good, sweet, gentle shepherd would gobble up his friends with such delectable delight!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_004<tab>Well, being a shepherd is more than being a <var 1A 02 /var>friend<var 1A 01 /var> to sheep. Your duty is to ensure no part of their life goes to waste─you milk them, shear their wool, and one day, yes, see that their skin becomes leather and their bodies nourishment for others.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_005<tab>We shepherds rely on our sheep for survival, especially in such unforgiving climes. So I did my utmost to repay their sacrifice with as happy and comfortable a life as I could provide.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_006<tab>I believe they were happy, anyway. They say happy sheep provide better milk─and indeed, the cheese I made from their yield was quite popular at the tavern.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_007<tab>It paired wonderfully with ale─in fact, I remember one acquaintance of mine downing their weight in drink, so delighted were they by the combination. Their dwarven friend was perfectly appalled, scolded them something awful...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_008<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Eo Tyr<var 1A 01 /var>! Haven't you had your fun by now!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_009<tab>Tee hee heeeeee! Never enough fun, Anden─not when it's with you!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_010<tab>Oooh, Big Anden was strong and lovely, but Little Anden is <var 1A 02 /var>adorable<var 1A 01 /var> and lovely.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_011<tab>A-Adorable?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_012<tab>Oooh, don't think you can simply flatter your way out of my discontent! ...Even though you very well may!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_001<tab>Yes, I know these waves of inspiration well. Without a doubt, I passed many a happy evening absorbed in my crafting.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_002<tab>I remember making and selling all sorts of things. Sheepskin rugs, for instance, and they fetched a good price too─nothing warms a stone house better!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_003<tab>You had a warm, fluffy rug in your house too, Anden. Oooh, it was so very, very soft and lovely for snoozing.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_004<tab>Oooh, I did, didn't I! I remember becoming so absorbed in the finer points of crafting and leatherwork that I once petitioned different sorts of skin from this Mystel hunter I knew. What was their name again...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_005<tab><sigh> Yeees, yes. I had a feeling this was coming.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_006<tab>Hee hee hee! You know me so well, Anden.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_007<tab>But you don't have to restrain yourself. I do so love it when you bluster and fluster and wiggle about in delightful confusion. Go on, go on!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_008<tab>Eh? Be flustered on command? That's not─! How am I supposed to─? ...Oooh, I'm doing it, aren't I?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_009<tab>That reminds me─they say there's a fiery red Mystel made entirely of crystal who is friends with our king. Any friend of the king must be friends with their sapling, right?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_010<tab>I knew it. Urianger and the crystal Mystel─what lovely friends you have!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_011<tab>Friends...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_012<tab>...Do you suppose I had friends? I remember a particular group of people with whom I associated... Yes, they would help me with work sometimes, and...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_013<tab>Oooh, that's right! Those people I've been remembering─they were travelers!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_014<tab>A Galdjent...two elves...a dwarf and a Mystel...eh? There was one more, wasn't there? Who was it... A...Hume?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_015<tab>Of course! Ardbert!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_016<tab>Wait, what's that look for? Did you know Ardbert as well?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_017<tab>What a coincidence! Well, I suppose he <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> traverse the realm on his various adventures─but he and his comrades spent a winter here, once.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_018<tab>They helped me with all sorts of little requests and errands, and at the end of a long day's work, we often broke bread together.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_019<tab>Our first meeting was rather dramatic, though─I seemed to give them all quite a shock. But after that initial awkwardness, we became fast friends. If ever they ventured nearby, they would always make a point to call.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_020<tab>...Wait, why <var 1A 02 /var>were<var 1A 01 /var> they so shocked by me? Something feels odd...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_100<tab>Now you're sounding more like yourself! You did so love mingling with your sheepies, after all. Snuggling up in a sea of fluffy wool and happy bleating...although I doubt they'd let you snuggle looking like <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_101<tab>Snuggling... Yes, I must have done, seeing as it was so...cold outside?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_102<tab>That's right. You wouldn't know it from this blossoming meadow, but these parts used to be far too cold for flowers. We <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> in the mountains, after all.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_103<tab>I must have warded off the chill somehow─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, could you bring me something I might have used to that end? Anything you can manage.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_100<tab>Speaking of eating things both lovely and loathsome─have you remembered that you used to eat sheep, Anden?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_101<tab>What!? I-I had no idea my obsession with sheep extended so far as to...<var 1A 02 /var>consume<var 1A 01 /var> them.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_102<tab>But all things considered, I suppose that makes a certain degree of sense. ...It might also explain why I suddenly find myself craving roasted meat. Hmm.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_103<tab>Regardless, while diet is irrelevant to a leafman, I must have put consideration into my meals as a person. Any guess as to what I might have eaten?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_100<tab>Looking at Little Anden reminds me of how True Anden was once so enraptured by dwarven beards. Do all fluffy things fascinate you, Anden?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_101<tab>Oooh, the beards! Yes, for the longest time, I assumed they were naturally grown from the chin, so I was surprised to discover that they actually attach at the helm.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_102<tab>As an amateur artisan myself, I cannot help but admire such unique dwarven handicrafts.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_103<tab>...Hm? Why did I say that? <var 1A 02 /var>Was<var 1A 01 /var> I an artisan? I do remember sitting before the hearth on snowy days and making...<var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var>. Handicrafts of some sort? Does that sound probable to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>Anden is pleased with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Probably Proper Person<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>Anden is delighted with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Tentatively True <var 08 E905 ((Tradeswoman)) ((Tradesman)) /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>Anden is overjoyed with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Just and Generous Journeyer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>Anden could not be happier with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Familiar Friend-like Face<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>And yet there is still much work to be done if he is to regain both his memories and true form. To that end, Anden has a new favor to ask of you...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab>Through your efforts, Anden has remembered much and more about his former life. It seems, however, that he has a different sort of question to ask you...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>The Custom Deliveries list for Anden has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Anden and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>A new quest continuing the story of Anden's efforts to regain his true form is now available. Upon its completion, the Custom Deliveries list for Anden will be updated.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_000<tab>Thank you for bringing me so many nice things, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_001<tab>It's always so good to chat with another person. These pixies certainly make their own fun, but their games can get rather exhausting at times...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_000<tab>I truly appreciate your efforts, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thank you for bringing me so many helpful reminders.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_001<tab>I haven't much to offer in the way of recompense, but please feel free to snuggle a sheep or two before you go. It will both soothe and invigorate you like little else!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_000<tab>These exchanges of ours rather remind me of doing business in the castle town.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_001<tab>Having spent most of my time either alone or with sheep, driving a hard bargain was never a skill I kept well honed. Oooh, those merchants used to haggle so ruthlessly! I never could get the deal I wanted...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_002<tab>In that sense, handling Eo Tyr and the others feels far simpler than talking down a merchant thirsty for coin. ...I'm no longer fit for normal society, am I?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_000<tab>Oooh, I can't bear it anymore. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! These scrips we keep giving you─do you know where they come from? You <var 1A 02 /var>want<var 1A 01 /var> to know, don't you? Of course you do!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_001<tab><var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> certainly was curious, so I asked Lor Ul─and they said these scrips were “liberated” from mortals who wandered into Il Mheg. Liberated! What sort of neighborhood is this!?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_002<tab>I've been positively sick with guilt, watching you accept your recompense with such innocent joy, unaware that it's all been nothing but contraband. Forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Now you share my pain!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_005_000<tab>Might I ask for some advice, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Recently, Eo Tyr has been absolutely adamant that I become their sapling... As someone who took the leap, what do you think?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_EOTYR_005_001<tab>Pity me, royal sapling! I've been offering─offering ever so kindly, without any sort of trickery!─to forge the pact, but cruel, Mean Anden has been so frigid! So cold!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_EOTYR_005_002<tab>Oooh, I won't let him get snatched up by anyone else. He's <var 1A 02 /var>My<var 1A 01 /var> Anden, and so he shall be from now till forever!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_000<tab>Whenever you come to visit me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I can't help but think of Ardbert.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_001<tab>It was winter's end, the snow melting in the valley... “Back to our journey,” said he. “But sooner than you think, we'll meet again.” ...And that was the last I saw of him!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_002<tab>As far as I'm concerned, the only real villainy he's guilty of is keeping me waiting here so long! No matter what the rumors claimed, I always hoped to see them all crossing the valley again someday, hale and whole. Laughing together, as once we did...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_003<tab>Oooh, you didn't come to hear my sorrowful musings! Still, whenever I look at you, I feel as though something of Ardbert is there in your eyes... Heh, what a silly thing to say. My apologies.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_004<tab>Promise me something, though, won't you? Go and visit your old friends from time to time. They miss you more than you could ever imagine.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_AFTWEEKLY_000_000<tab>You have delivered the weekly maximum of six items to Anden. You may begin making deliveries again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_ANDEN_000_000<tab>What is this feeling? Not sudden, per se...but new... Hmm...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_QUEST_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>In order to undertake the next quest, speak with Anden as a Disciple of the Hand or the Land.
